fields.question: Do you have a condition as a result of either your physical, mental, sensory, learning or cognitive disabilities or illnesses, substance misuse or brain injury?
As a result of your needs are you unable to achieve two or more of the eligible outcomes below?
Can you "Maintain a habitable home environment" alone within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety, or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g house work, laundry, disrepair issues, infestation, hoarding)

fields.question: Can you "Manage and maintain nutrition" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g shopping, food / drink preparation, eating and drinking, diet, swallowing)

fields.question: Can you "Manage toilet needs" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g wash self after toilet, continence, pressure care)

fields.question: Can you "Maintain personal hygiene" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g strip wash, personal care, grooming, general presentation)

fields.question: Can you "Be appropriately clothed" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g dressing - for all seasons, activity based tasks, zips, buttons)

fields.question: Can you "Develop and maintain family or other personal relationships" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: (e.g social, family/other personal relationships, isolation, leisure)

fields.question: Can you "Make use of necessary facilities or services in the local community?
fields.hint: (including public transport and recreational facilities/services)" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?

fields.question: Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: For example, outdoor mobility, wheelchair use, access, public or hospital transport

fields.question: Can you "Access and engage in work, training, education or volunteering" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: Access and engage in work, training, education or volunteering

fields.question: Can you "Carry out any caring responsibilities for a child" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: Carry out any caring responsibilities for a child

fields.question: Can you "Be able to make use of your home safely" alone within within a reasonable time and without significant pain, distress, anxiety or risk to yourself or others?
Details of related needs and goals
fields.hint: For example, transfers - bath/shower, chair, toilet/commode and bed. Mobility - indoor, stairs, and falls.  Access to essential facilities, re-housing etc

fields.question: As a result of being unable to achieve these outcomes is there, or is there likely to be, a significant impact on your wellbeing?
Details of the impact on your wellbeing (in the absence of any support you may already have in place)
fields.hint:
The impact on your wellbeing should be looked at disregarding any support you may already have and should take into account the following areas, as well as your (or your representatives) views.
Personal dignity and being treated with respect
Physical and

fields.question: If conversation is completed with the Carer present, does the Carer agree this is a joint conversation?
Has the carer been assessed as having one or more eligible need?
Impact of caring on your own Carer's independence
What are your informal arrangements when you are unable to provide care?
Does the person that you care for have any special requirements that we should know about?
Was the Carer provided with Information, Advice and Other Universal Services / Signposting?
If yes, was the Carer signposted to a relevant support service such as the Carers Centre?
Will respite or other forms of carer support be delivered to the cared-for person?
Date of Plan (Budget)
fields.hint: (Today's date, being the submission date of this Google form - instead of authorised date)
